text: does anyone have an example of using the page listing api with the `in` for the slug parameter? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/pages/get_pages>

im doing this here:
```
<http://api.hubapi.com/content/api/v2/pages?hapikey=XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX&subcategory=site_page&slug__in=about>
```
but I am getting an error saying `message: "Filtering by "slug in" is not allowed",` yet it shows you can in the docs

Is anyone else having issues with Chrome and the blog editor? For some reason in the inline editor, I cannot click into the blog box to highlight anything or move the position of the cursor without using the keyboard
